name: dhan-optionchain-project
description: A project to interact with the Dhan API for fetching option chain data.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && tsc
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && gh-pages -d client/dist

author: Your Name
